attributes.action: protect the citizens of britain from abuse based on appearance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are protected by the law from discrimination and abuse due to "racism" and yet every day people suffer the same discrimination and abuse because of their chosen appearence or social stereotype, It must stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
